title: ICE when transmuting into a static

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
```
#![no_main]
extern crate core;
use core::intrinsics::transmute;
static screen: &'static [u16, ..1] = unsafe{transmute(0x6000000 as *mut [u16, ..1])};
```

```
$ rustc --version
rustc 0.11.0-nightly (b57d272e9908e164a72bd1a688141031705e1208 2014-07-11 01:11:36 +0000)
```

